website_summaries.verdict: Although this wallet won't hold large items and has some longevity concerns, it's a budget-friendly option that won't take up a lot of space in your handbag or pocket.
pros: Provides RFID blocking in a trim, attractive design
Has a variety of compartments including 18 card slots and 2 zippered pockets
cons: Won't fit large items like a phone or keys
Snap and zipper closures could be more durable, as they have been known to jam or break

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS WALLET
customer_reviews.text: I'v had this wallet for almost 8 months now and it still looks new. The material is waterproof and sturdy so it is holding up reaelly well with no signs of wear. The best part of this wallet is that it holds all of my cards, I can see them, and get easy access to them. The zippered compartments are large enough to hold receipts, biz cards, and bills if they are folded. The only negative is that I wish that there was a change compartment on the back so I could keep coins separate from everything else. Overall worth the price, would buy others in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Marie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this travel wallet, as I travel frequently. Here are the two biggest problems I encountered over the past two weeks with this product. 1. It opens completely; there is no way to open just one side. When it is open, it exposes every card in the inserts. There is no privacy from prying eyes. 2.It is 13.5" long when open, and the slots are vertical, not horizontal, so the entire wallet must be opened every time. It takes up a lot of counter space. I am going to have to return it because I require more privacy than this wallet affords. P.S. The snaps and zippers worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: FL Senior

customer_reviews.title: Portable solution that holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this product- didn’t think it would fit everything I’m used to carrying in a wallet plus RFID card holder. Wow - was I wrong! This is a very slim solution that holds unfolded paper cash in one zipper compartment and coins in the other. Inside, I use one side of card holders for ID & rewards cards and the other for credit cards. It’s a very handy & secure solution that is very portable if needed. It’s also very well-made (my year-old wallet was chipping at the corners & was beginning to look bad). Highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Piehl

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My last wallet was bulky, tattered and needed to be replaced. I can't believe the quality of this one for such an amazing price. I am about to order another one since I like this so much. It holds tons of cards and is very streamlined. It's so much less bulky than a typical wallet. It works great as a clutch as well. I do wish that it was about 1" longer and could hold a few more cards. To insert and take out bills is a slight bit difficult and the extra length would make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: qpalzm

customer_reviews.title: Classy and well designed - I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This Wallet is everything I didn’t know I needed ;-). It holds all my cards, and cash, without being bulky. Both the inside snap, and the outside (2 position) snap hold well, and the two zippered areas are a good size for dollar bills. Note: I use a separate coin purse for coins - because although you could use one of the zipper pouches in this wallet for coins, I think it would throw the utility off (add bulk, etc) which would negatively impact my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: PTators

customer_reviews.title: Button snap broke within days
customer_reviews.text: Got this wallet and was pretty excited and optimistic after reading other reviews. However less than a week after starting to use it the bottom snap button part just fell right off (see photo). It’s still useable unless the top one falls off but it was pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: alissa

customer_reviews.title: Very Sleek Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased the light pink wallet, when it arrive I was very pleased it was sleek and could hold quite a bit. I was happy with it so I ordered 2 more black & what supposed to be red but was a hot pink. I will be ordering more very soon until I get all the colors to match my purses. Shipping was very fast
customer_reviews.author: Lasharus Leggett Capers

customer_reviews.title: Heavy zipper and not the quality expected
customer_reviews.text: Has a very hard to zip heavy zipper (this may be due to the RFID capability?) I bought one for my self and one for a travel buddy for Christmas. They were not very user friendly and not of good quality due to the zipper. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Gulledge

customer_reviews.title: Great for Multiple Cards!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought and returned a number of wallets that claimed to hold a large number of cards, but they wouldn't close if you tried to fill most, let alone all, of the slots. I've got 16 cards in the slots, along with cash and some more cards in the zippered compartments, and the wallet closes quite comfortably, without even using the second snap. The material is more plastic-y than synthetic leather, the zippers aren't the highest quality, and you need to measure the purse you intend to carry it in, as it is quite long. But it's a great solution at a really reasonable price (I got it for $11.19 on a Lightning Deal), and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than one might expect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because it was suggested as the companion piece to a crossbody bag. The photos showed that it holds a phone, cash, change, and credit cards. Unfortunately, the phone pocket is much too small for my iPhone 7Plus and even for my checkbook. If I wanted it for just the credit card slots, it would be fine, but I need more and this wallet will be donated to a nearby charity. For my purposes, it was wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci T.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good... Happy wife, happy life...
customer_reviews.text: The five stars rating comes from different reasons. My wife liking the wallet and her been happy with the wallet is the most important reason. Now, the wallet feels premium, the zippers are very smooth when opening and closing (which my wife mentioned), is not to big or to small and everything fits perfectly and after adding all the cards, etc... is not bulky like other wallets that I've seen my wife use. Moreover, since the wallet comes with a 12 month warranty it helps to reach the 5 stars rating, however, since the wallet was bought recently only time will tell how durable the wallet actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel Quiros

customer_reviews.title: Stores plenty and is very accessible. Slim profile.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I have been looking for in a wallet. It's got a slim profile but holds so much! Looks sharp. Holds all my cards, and it's easy to remove them from the slots without too much effort. The zipper pockets hold cash, change, business cards, gift cards, etc. It's almost half the thickness of my previous wallets, even when full. I love the snap closure because you simply unsnap the wallet, flip open and can review all your credit cards, making it easier to decide which card to use. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally M.

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything and still flat & light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few wallets trying to lighten my load but I found none of them held all my cards. Between license debit and credit cards discount cards and frequent Shopper cards that I could not imagine being out and leaving them at home. I also had reloadable game cards for my daughter so if we randomly went to play, I'd need! This held everything with room to spare for receipts change and cash. And it's still very slim and flat!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Smiley

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried every size wallet under the sun and, unless you want one to cram your phone in, this is the one for me. It’s the second one I’ve bought. It holds all my credit cards and ID on one side and my insurance and membership cards in the other. The zip pockets are spacious enough for cash, coins and collecting random coupons and receipts. The zippers, snaps, material and color have held up very well on my first one and I’ve had it over a year now with daily use. Lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amberly

customer_reviews.title: Leather, very slim & great for downsizing!
customer_reviews.text: This women's wallet looks EXACTLY as shown on Amazon! I purchased the black leatherone and I LOVE IT! THIS wallet is sleek, slim & holds several cards! Way more than I have. Cash fits in another area that has a zipper. I have a Coach purse that holds lots of items, My old wallet is huge & weighs a LOT! I've been trying for a long time to downsize. At least my new wallet will Definitely lighten the load in my purse!!! I'm EXTREMELY HAPPY with THIS PURCHASE! AND this NEW Wallet will give me Lots of extra space in my purse! I'm excited to use it & throw out the old wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: This has PLENTY of room
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for a credit card holder to also hold gift cards, appointment cards and insurance cards. I finally found it and can't wait to take it on vacation with me so I have everything I could possibly need. Now everything is strewn all over the house so it sure will be nice to have it all organized in one place!
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Omigosh! I so wanted to love this and it's a daily struggle to use. The problem is the narrowness of the zippered money compartments and extreme tightness and lack of give of credit card slots. I have to leave the cards 3/4 out and on a slant and to get cash I'm stuck for a long time struggling at the Checkouts. I would replace this in a heartbeat but it was relatively spendy so I just make do. It's not designed either for cash or plastic users.
customer_reviews.author: H Werner

customer_reviews.title: Zippered Bill Section Too Short
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star review but you have to fold bills because the section that should accommodate them is not long enough. Then folding the bills makes the wallet bulkier. I've been using it without any other problem and appreciate the quality and security of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty C.

customer_reviews.title: Essential Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this wallet in both style qualities & different colors. I frankly appreciate the navy and black high quality wallets. The higher quality begets an easier to operate, smooth zipper track line and more well-rounded materials. I felt like the black was more my style years ago but right now, navy is more my speed. Your preference. If this review has been helpful to you, please click the ‘Helpful’ button to let myself and others know that it has helped you.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Huge and stiff
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a winner online and I gave it a couple of months before I gave up on it. My main complaint is the material used in the wallet. It is stiff and unbending. Cards have to be forced into slots and the large size makes it difficult to take it in and out of a medium sized purse. The slot for driver's license is so tight I had to put tape on my license to be able to take it out of the slot. It holds all my credit and courtesy cards but I have gone back to using my old soft leather wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Elfnotes

customer_reviews.title: Neat and compact
customer_reviews.text: Since the pandemic, I try to downsize what I carry with me into the store. I normally have a thick wallet with my purse so I was looking for a thinner wallet. This one serves that purpose perfectly. It's a no frills wallet that can hold all my cards and cash. It's secured when all the zippers and buttons are closed. The thickness is perfect to hold in one of my hand along with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Coconut

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited...
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is pretty and the right size I was expecting. The only problem was they decided it was a good idea to ship it with something else I ordered (a large plastic pan) and it managed to get bent. I didn’t think it was a big deal and I let it sit for a few hours to flatten back out or something and it didn’t happen... so I tried to bend it the opposite way back into place. Still messed up. I’m a little disappointed. If I knew it was going to come damaged, I wouldn’t have ordered it. I’m really sad.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Traded in my Kate Spade
customer_reviews.text: I’m a die hard Kate Spade fan (don’t get me wrong, I still am). I needed a new wallet and didn’t want to spend the $70 on designer so I decided to browse Amazon. I LOVE this wallet! I always have trouble fitting all my cards, but this had enough slots. Also opens up so everything’s available and you aren’t digging. The two pouches are nice and it stays slim! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Ideally slim, seems backwards.
customer_reviews.text: This is slimmer than my last wallet, which was my goal for this one. I can fit all my cards, coupons, etc in it. The zippers are a little clunky, and I think the inside seems backwards. When I open the wallet snap-side up, I want to see my ID, but it's on the other side. You also need fingernails and some finger strength to get your cards out, but at least they probably won't fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren J

customer_reviews.title: This is great for all the `extra' gift cards, business cards etc.
customer_reviews.text: I carry my `main' cards in my phone wallet, but I keep all my `other' cards in this holder. I could actually use another one too! Its attractive and easy to zip up. I wrote the name of the cards on the top of each card, in permanent marker so I can easily see what cards are in there. Love it! Now, I can use these misc gift cards cause I am reminded of what i have!
customer_reviews.author: annieb

customer_reviews.title: Wallet is very useful and well put together
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Green RFID Blocking Bifold Multi card case wallet with zipper pocket for at least a year and a half. It has held up well and I just recently ordered this black one along with a black cross-body purse that I wanted. I ordered from the same seller, received items better than expected and quickly. Would order again. Enjoying both wallets.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually pleased with my Amazon purchases....not so much this time. I bought this wallet as a gift for a friend. Frankly I'd be embarrassed to give it to her. It is cleaply made and cheap looking. Sorry would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: bdavis1127

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Slim & Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Received it today and already in love! Super slim and I was able to fit everything I had in my old bulky wallet. My checkbook fits in one of the pockets, which is a plus for me and holds my Swarovski pen perfectly! I will definitely purchase more colors. Highly recommend this wallet if you are looking for something sleek, slim & stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product in my house for months without using it because it looked awkward to use. Then I started using it and am pleasantly surprise by how quickly I got used to it! It's still slim after adding my credit cards to it which really surprised me. Now that I'm used to it, I added money to it and am still impressed that it's still slim to use! I'm really happy getting this wallet,,,,
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet I ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wallet. This is my 2nd time purchasing it. Unfortunately my first was stolen out of my vehicle. I couldn't wait to replace it. Well made. Fits a lot. Makes me feel organized. Fits is most hand bags. This is my forever wallet. I get a lot of compliments on it. Great price! Highly recommended it! Stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Austin

customer_reviews.title: slimline but with so many slots.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this wallet. It is perfect for what I need and fits nicely into a slimmer purse. There are so many slots for cards, as well as 2 zippered sections for bills and coin. This is a very well-designed wallet and really helps to keep things well-organized where you can get to what you need in an instant.
customer_reviews.author: tunisianswife

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet!! It creates much more room in my purse than my previous wallets, yet is substantial enough to carry on its own. And I love that it is RFID safe, as I travel extensively out of the country. The wallet is very stylish-looking, and I have already shared your product’s listing on Amazon with my hair stylist and grocery store clerk. I am ordering a couple more today as gifts. I just cannot say enough about this product! Perfect in every way for me!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Unisex or Manager's Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: It says "Womens Wallet" in the description but I believe they're cut themselves short. I'm a guy & I bought this to store my multiple credit cards & other needed cards safely. It's very nicely built & spacious for anyone today who has a handful of cards to manage. A must for a small business manager or someone who manages a small fleet of fuel cards!
customer_reviews.author: Feryl Foxwood

customer_reviews.title: Different colors, different inside
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these and it had 19 card slots and I liked it a lot. I then decided I wanted a second one and when it came it only had 17 pockets and was about 1/2” shorter. In the meantime, my mom had ordered one because she liked my first one and hers has 20 pockets and is the same overall size as the first one. I’ve tried contacting the seller about my second one being defective but I haven’t gotten a response.
customer_reviews.author: tricia

customer_reviews.title: Hold many cards
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people have asked me where Ive bought this wallet. I like that I have enough room to store all my cards. I wish it was a smidge bigger so it would be easier to take money bills in and out from the zipper. Obviously folded bills fit perfect but when you straighten the bills it is kind of tight fit
customer_reviews.author: min

customer_reviews.title: Slim, lightweight wallet fits everything and more
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet. It fits all my credit cards and has room for my rewards cards too. The side pockets are big enough where you can fit cash on either side without having to fold it. Bonus win for me! This wallet is light weight and slim, taking up the least amount of space in my purse. I think I need a new sunglass case now since that's the largest thing in my purse after my new wallet was added. Very convenient plus the snap closure on both sides is very secure. Comes in variety of colors, I choose black and love it. Doesn't bleed and doesn't feel cheap at all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little wallet! It has a gold zipper and the material used matched the new Steve Madden purse I got. I had a larger wallet but all of the contents fit inside this and did force me to purge unnecessary stuff. It looks nice and I love that it has added security protection.
customer_reviews.author: etay27

customer_reviews.title: Holds all your cards
customer_reviews.text: I had a customer come to my register and she pulled out the travelambo. I thought it was great because it is flat and holds a lot of cards plus it has 2 zipper compartments for bills or whatever you need them for. Most wallets are way too bulky for a smaller purse. I ordered one as soon as I got home. It works great for me. Credit cards on one side and membership/gift cards on the other.
customer_reviews.author: R O

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CONSTRUCTION FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Card slots are a bit snug. Some cards are thicker now. Hopefully in time the slots will relax a bit. All future cards will be bulkier; keep that in mind when manufacturing future wallets. Currency compartment a wee bit short. Bills "just make it" without folding . Toni Molik
customer_reviews.author: Toni Molik

customer_reviews.title: Neat appearance and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I like that this product is vegan. It has plenty of pockets for cards, a window slot for my ID, and two nice zipper compartments for change or miscellaneous stuff. It folds easily and snaps smoothly and securely. The card slots are not too tight and it is easy to slip them in and out as needed. I am enjoying it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Frogette

customer_reviews.title: So. Many. Pockets.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is great for me. I dont have a check book that I keep in my purse...I dont think many people do anymore....but this hold all my cash/coins/cards. I was hoping it would fit my phone too...but my phone is a note 10 plus.....it doesn't fit lol But it is easy access and it hold everything I need
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: Great on card space
customer_reviews.text: I like all the slots. No more picking which card is more important to carry on a day to day basis. When I open it up people always ask where did I get it from. You never realize how many cards you have between DL, health insurance, debit/credit, gift cards etc you carry till you fill one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Great Purse Organization Tool
customer_reviews.text: I had three different items in my purse to hold credit cards, gift cards, insurance and ID information. I wanted to organize into one and I'm glad I purchased this item because that is exactly what I was able to do. I really like this product. It's a little stiff but think it will loosen up as I use it. I do wise the card holder slots were a fraction wider. I have my permanent insurance card laminated and I couldn't squeeze it in one of the slots.
customer_reviews.author: Glennie

customer_reviews.title: Slim design
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE IT!!! Exactly what I was looking for... looks expensive but isn’t, slim design & not bulky and fits neatly in my purse or any bag... My iphone 7 plus fits in nicely, but without the case and finally have a slot for all of my cards and ID’s... So I am happy with my purchase may even consider buying another one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Hold lots of cards and RFID blocks
customer_reviews.text: Uunfortunately, with insurance, HSA, FSA, and all the other cards, most wallets are not adequate. I have 12 cards that hold all my family's information. This wallet is sleek, thin, folds in 1/2 and maintains my money and cards w/o problem. I have used for several months with travel and just as advertised. What is not advertised is that it cleans quite easily. I would buy another for a gift at any time. I use it 100% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Finding things quickly
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this wallet to anyone who has ever got in a tizzy at the drive-thru , or cash register rifling through your ourse or wallet. It so great because you can see all of your cards just enough. It comes in so many awesome colors...I will be ordering fro my mother and sisters!!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Dobesh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is great to keep you organized. It holds all my cards and cash without being bulky at all. It freed up a lot of space in my purse. The material also appears sturdy and I love that there are many colors to choose from. I ordered one for myself and for a gift and the recipient loved it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST wallet I’ve ever had!!! It’s slim and holds all my cards . The best part is that it doesn’t fill up with junk like my other wallets cause there is only room in zipper pocket for change or bills. I can see everything at a glance .
customer_reviews.author: Alice c reedy

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious meaning it has do many card slots, 2 zipper to put change or bills or even a cell phone I tried it. Plus I feel cool opening it up to use it at the store or wherever. Material looks sturdy that it will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is spacious, I didn't have a hard time getting my cards in and out, I like the design. I do not personally use the wallet anymore, prefer a smaller design. But someone who carries a purse, I would definitely recommend this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: myearsareitchy

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s an inexpensive wallet,yet light-weight @ holds a lot of cards. I broke my back & needed to lighten my purse. Cards come out easy & it has zippered compartments for cash or valuables. I love fine leather, but this fits the bill for my current need.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Vallimont

customer_reviews.title: Cannot not beat the price!!! You will not regret getting this wallet!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: YES, YES, YES!!!! Is seriously ALL I can say about this wallet!!!! I was so surprised how sleek, sexy and how it holds everything! I threw out my $80 wallet once this new wallet came to my house! My mom is now going to order this!!!!! LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mckenzie Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the women's wallet that I purchased. It is supposed to block people from stealing your credit card info, etc. The wallet has plenty of room for all of my cards, gift cards, etc. Great wallet!
customer_reviews.author: DAB

customer_reviews.title: Very big
customer_reviews.text: It is very big. Same size as a big checkbook ladies wallet. It’s just set up a little differently. But it certainly isn’t something anyone could put in a pocket. It is a “purse wallet” for sure. If that is what you want, it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I carry a cross body bag that isn’t very large and this wallet is perfect. It fits all of my cards and isn’t big and bulky and it’s easy to get my cards out. I liked it so much I ordered a second one for my back pack. My daughters seen it and they both ordered one. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Recepients Loved Their Gift
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice wallets especially if you are a lady with many different cards. I bought these as a gift and the receipients were pleased. I definitely would purchase this item again. I was able to purchase these on the lightening deal at a much cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Flyby711

customer_reviews.title: Wallet, phone
customer_reviews.text: My phone doesn't fit in it as advertised, but I like the wallet
customer_reviews.author: vcdeitrick

customer_reviews.title: My GF loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a gift for my GF as her wallet was all over the place. Looked nice in the ad, price was right, so I got it. When I gave it to her, she opened the package and she loved it. It is really nice and holds all her essentials. I loved that it also has zippers as she is always losing money because she is as clumsy as they come. Thanks for a great product, I am sure she will have it for a long time coming.
customer_reviews.author: Babestreet

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is bigger than I expected but I absolutely love it!! I bought this because I needed a flatter wallet that would take up less room in my purse and something I could easily slip into the pocket of my baby's diaper bag. It's perfect for that!! Would buy again in more colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Calik

customer_reviews.title: Slim line. Best amazon purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best things I’ve ever bought on Amazon. It’s so slim gets hold SO much. The quality is so good that it looks like designer quality. I love the double snap. Keeps everything safe and there’s so many slots for cards yet it’s not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Walsh

customer_reviews.title: I Think This Is A Great Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying using this wallet. I purchased this wallet to hold all my credit and store cards. The bonus is a place to safely keep the cash I carry. However, the ID area did not allow me to put my driver's license.
customer_reviews.author: Arline Moberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for car holder that will hold all of my ID's and cards and this is perfect because it holds a pretty good amount of cards. It is very sturdy, the quality of the product is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rodora Lindley-Shappet

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet! I usually buy high end wallets but there is never enough room for all my cards without putting them on top of each other. I filled this up and still have 3 empty spots. So much lighter also. Showed my friend and she ordered two and got me another color! I have people comment while out shopping about it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Paula M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this wallet, I was first introduced to it by a passenger of mine at the airport, when I saw it , I immediately asked her where she got, when she said amazon, I ordered 3 of them . Now when I send passengers struggling to pull out their Ids , I immediately tell them of this wallet, I’ve had a couple of passengers order them while I’m checking them in for their flight. They joke and ask me if I have stock? 🤣😂 I just say that it is an easy wallet and I highly recommend it.❤️❤️❤️❤️👋🏽👌🏽👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin with a lot of card slots.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked all the card slots. Between store loyalty cards, library cards, insurance cards, gift cards and bank cards, I only have 2 slots left. I am worried about it staying closed but it has been fine so far. It is so thin! I love that!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy & Greg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I needed a thin but multi-card holding wallet. My pictures fit and the two zippered pockets work for coins and bills. It does say that a phone would fit in one, but I think it would have to be a smaller one. I am very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VMB

customer_reviews.title: Better than any name brand wallet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve certainly bought expensive wallets before but I haven’t even spent one hour with this product and I’m in love!! I can tell I’m going to be using this for a long time and gifting it as well. It’s so convenient. I have a card in every single slot and it isn’t bulky at all. I definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola Paredes Perez

customer_reviews.title: SIZE IS LARGE
customer_reviews.text: if you like BIG wallets, then this is for you! this wallet is the same as carrying a clutch. im more of a slim minimalist wallet person so i had to return it. other than the size, the quality was great. it has tons of pockets and the zippers were spacious but my iphone 7+ (without a cell cover) could not fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it.. even with the card slots almost full, the wallet was still thin enough to fit in my small purse. It has 2 zipper pockets which I used for cash and miscellaneous receipts. My only regret is that I wished I bought a brighter color so I can easily find it inside my seemingly bottomless black purse.
customer_reviews.author: MissCharley

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and useful
customer_reviews.text: Like all of the pockets in this wallet. Looks like the high-end wallet I just bought but this has many more card slots!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBee

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is great. It holds all of my cards, its very compact and sleek. I noticed by adding alot of coins the wallet becomes bulky. So I have decided not to add any coins in my wallet. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CHIC Mccann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent card and fold cash holder
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Has double snaps, one at end and a snap strap across middle. Makes seeing and accessing all your cards very easy, And good access to folding cash. Would recommend separate purse for coins.
customer_reviews.author: CoinCorraller41

customer_reviews.title: IPhoneXR with otter box case won’t fit in it.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this wallet. I wanted to use it to carry my car key fob, Id, credit cards and my iPhone XR cell phone. I use a slim otter box case with my phone and it won’t fit inside either zipper side of this wallet. So disappointing. Otherwise it’s slim, and a good size to carry alone to dinner or to run out to the store.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and having a snap at top and side hold it together in purse nicely. I didn't think it would close flat once it was filled completely, but it closed nicely. AA++
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee Case Wills

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: With this wallet I am able to put my dollar bills on one side and my change on the other. I like that the bills fit in my wallet without bunching up. I also like that it holds a bunch of credit cards and is rfid.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer7654

customer_reviews.title: Good for cc’s
customer_reviews.text: I like it for cc’s but the zippered areas are not large enough.. have to fold dollar bills and the zipper catches and doesn’t always close all the way so change falls out.. dont keep much change as dont think it would close well.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Teagle

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but....
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my stuff perfectly. I don’t like how it opens up long ways though! It’s awkard If it opened up from the other side it would be so much better! But I still use it!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space for cards and money
customer_reviews.text: the card slots are really tight. Which I suppose is good so they don’t slip out. The zipper looked more silver to me in the picture but they are gold. I probably wouldn’t have got it if I’d know they were good.
customer_reviews.author: princic

customer_reviews.title: Functionality at its best
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet! Very stylish and holds all my cards. I have an iPhone 8 plus with a case on it and my phone won't fit unfortunately. Other than that i don't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: great if you have a lot of cards to carry. I personally love it for the slim overall design but it is still able to hold a lot with so many slots and two zippered compartments. Would definitely recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Added protection from ID theft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet to replace several individual protective sleeves for individual cards. The wallet makes it so much more convenient for me since I am not taking cards out of sleeves, putting them back in sleeve and putting back in my wallet. Just unsnap 2 snaps and done! Not the greatest for carrying cash but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Craver

customer_reviews.title: A Very, Very HAPPY and SATISFIED Customer:))
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! For the first time ALL my credit cards and ID can easily fit in one wallet without any bulkiness. Quality is great too. My co- worker loves it too so I got her one in her favorite color (purple). ;)
customer_reviews.author: Sherbaby

customer_reviews.title: One of my finest buy yet!
customer_reviews.text: Love the wallet! It serves my need to a tee! Holds a lot of cards, the zippers are high quality, and the snaps stay closed. I would recommend this wallet to everyone who has tried other wallet and can't find a great one!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slim wallet & holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet! It holds everything my previous wallet held & takes up way less room in my purse! So slender & lightweight. Perfect to fit in a small crossbody purse & take on vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made!
customer_reviews.text: I am going to take this to Europe this summer! It is much larger than I expected (which is why it was listed as a woman't wallet--it is purse size!), but so well made that I have to keep it!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Slim but lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I love that this travel wallet has so many card slots. It's also very slim, as opposed to my usual wallet, and has the protection against card scanners. Which means it will probably now be my everyday wallet, also.
customer_reviews.author: vlmsan

customer_reviews.title: Big But Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wallet because my sister bought one. I saw it - loved it and ordered one because I couldn't believe how much it holds, but still stays nice and slim. She bought it because she travels frequently and appreciated the no scan protection. Then, our Mom saw mine and decided she would have one as well, so we have now purchased three and everyone is loving it. Very good value for price.
customer_reviews.author: LORI

customer_reviews.title: Women's RFID blocking wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. Its compact has more than enough space for cards and id's. Its compact and well organized. My wife loves it. Will definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaison Palocaren

customer_reviews.title: great material.
customer_reviews.text: the only thing is when you open it at the cash register all the store cards are shown like i was a millionare with all the credit in the world. lol but it's beautiful and i love it.
customer_reviews.author: nanashouse202

customer_reviews.title: Made very well.
customer_reviews.text: I love the wallet! Thus is my second one. I wanted a different color. I tried to reorder a few months ago but for some reason they didn’t have them. I tried again and was sooooooo happy I could order another one. I also ordered for two of my friends. Everywhere I went and pulled it out to pay, the clerk always said, I love that wallet. I’ve had no problems at all. They are made well and last pretty darn good. Highly recommend. I have never given a review on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love it easy to access cards and keeps them visible so you can see what your grabbing. Also love that I can put cash and other papers into the other compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette Pal

customer_reviews.title: Very handy, but not perfect, because of the zippers.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, but the zippers aren’t really smooth, so I hope they hold up. (I think they are a little too heavy-duty for the item.) Very handy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Jones

customer_reviews.title: Is perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it holds all my cards. Is thin enough to fit in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty  good wallet if you have a lot of cards to carry
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet if you have a lot of cards to carry lots of slots. The side pockets zip but you can’t fit much in them. However over all for the price not a bad wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this wallet. Second one I have purchased, this time I wanted a different color. I get a ton of compliments on how awesome my wallet is.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, study.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little wallet, I hate purses so bought this along with a little wristlet attachment. Sturdy, I throw it around everywhere. Does not look super cheap!!! Lots of card inserts.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect thin wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I got a smaller purse and needed a thinner wallet. I regret not taking a picture of my old wallet before, but this wallet is perfect! I have a lot of (sometimes useless) cards, so having so many slots is really nice! I didn’t use the zipper pouches at all, so I’m sure that would probably add a small amount of bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling and the best part is not having to worry about some stealing your credit card numbers. It slides right down into your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Well organized.
customer_reviews.text: I carry more credit cards than cash nowadays and this wallet has many credit card slots, made it so much easier to find the right card. Also very sleek. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: WWTRAV

customer_reviews.title: Stitching leaves much to be desired
customer_reviews.text: It's a large enough wallet and I used it on my vacation the strap broke by the thrid time I had to open it. I will still use it but not sure how to sow it back on because it really fits everything
customer_reviews.author: Dana

product_meta.title: Travelambo Womens Walllet RFID Blocking Bifold Multi Card Case Wallet with Zipper Pocket Crosshatch
feature_bullets: THE INEXPENSIVE WALLET: High quality PU vegan leather + dust-proof cover + simple polybag packing + superb craftmanship = an inexpensive and high quality womens wallet.

ELEGANT DESIGN: Our checkered womens bifold wallet features 18 card slots and 2 zippered pockets for cash, coins or a cell phone. This functional wallet with a snap to buckle up is perfect to organizer all your personal essentials. Useful every-day carry for you to put all your cards, IDs, receipts, cell phone, tickets and other small items securely.
RFID BLOCKING: It keeps your identity and credit card information away from scanning and theft.
